ModMetaData.name: Tradeable AI Persona Core (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
Update of Emmotes mod for RimWorld 1.1 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1270748642
Support-chat: https://discord.gg/SuhwVpM
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/TradeableAIPersonaCore
--- Original Description --- AI Persona Cores are just far too rare in B18. This mod simply allows any trader capable of trading in Exotic goods to sell them again.
